metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20808 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Search screen of Movable Type (Movable Type 7 r.4903 and earlier (Movable Type 7 Series), Movable Type 6.8.0 and earlier (Movable Type 6 Series), Movable Type Advanced 7 r.4903 and earlier (Movable Type Advanced 7 Series), Movable Type Premium 1.44 and earlier, and Movable Type Premium Advanced 1.44 and earlier) allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
